description: The city's mayor orders an investigation amid outrage from residents and animal rights groups.
title: Wild boar family killed by police in Rome children's playground
title_page: Wild boar family killed by police in Rome children's playground - BBC News
maintext: "It was decided to hastily kill [the animals] who had found shelter in the Aurelio play area, instead of saving their lives given the alternative solutions that had been offered," a statement from the International Organization for Animal Protection said.
